Lumbricals (hand)
``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - **1-2nd Lumbrical**: FDP Tendons (radial sides) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **3-4th Lumbrical**: FDP tendons (bipennate from medial and lateral sides) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy202 # Insertion {#insertion} - **1st**: 2nd digit (DDE) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy202 - **2nd**: 3rd digit (DDE) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy202 - **3rd**: 4th digit (DDE) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy202 - **4th**: 5th digit (DDE) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy202 # Innervation {#innervation} - **1-2nd Lumbrical**: [Median N.]({{< var ref-median-nerve.path >}}) [@gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020; @yangInnervationLumbricalInterosseous2022] - **3-4th Lumbrical**: [Deep Br. of Ulnar N.]({{< var ref-deep-branch-of-ulnar-nerve.path >}}) [@gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020; @yangInnervationLumbricalInterosseous2022] - ([C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}), [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **2-5 MCP**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **2-5 PIP, DIP**: Extension @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes # Examination - Bunnell-Littler Test - Claw hand
